inn1.comm: Rahane is away first ball with a four, swinging in and bouncing into the pad from good length, and he times it past square leg, that is all you need to do at Eden
worked down to long leg for a single
another one moves in to the right hander, Rohit lets it come on and turns it in front of square to get off the mark
lovely touch again, both of his strokes have been uppish, but they have flown in the gap, Rahane punches this length ball with the incoming angle and it flies past short midwicket
length ball solidly defended to the leg side

Rahane flows into his third boundary of the over, Kula overpitches outside off, not much swing on this, Rahane eases into the line and caresses it right between extra cover and mid off, at Eden, you don't bother to run for those

Rohit could have been in trouble had Dilshan picked up the ball cleanly, Rohit had tapped this length ball to point and there was big hesitation between him and Rahane, but the ball slipped out of Dilshan's grasp towards third man
lets a gentle length ball pass by outside off this time
leans forward and defends a straightening length ball to extra cover
pitches it up into the pad, Rohit taps it in front of square
worked to square leg from around middle and off
back of a length, no pace to work with, Rohit nudges square on the leg side

moving sharply into the pad yet again is Kula, and Rahane works him through square leg, the man was behind square, and even though the ball was in the air, it was in vacant spaces, and this outfield is so ridiculously quick, even this has beaten the fielder's clumsy slide
taps a length ball to midwicket
plays it out quietly to point
Rohit takes a step forward, follows the line of the incoming delivery and turns it past short midwicket
moves in from well outside off, Rahane bends and guides it to point
tries to punch from the crease, but there is a lot of movement into him and he mistimes to extra cover
114.6 kph, absolutely no pace as Rohit waits on the front foot, only to push it softly to point
pitched further up outside off, and he drives to mid off
back of a length, pushed to the off side
tries to chop it past slip, but there is no room as Mathews angles this in, and it bounces into the crease from close to the splice
tries to force it down the ground now, but again he is cramped for room on this short of a length ball, Mathews fields
has the room for the drive now on this length ball but a crisp stroke is stopped sharply at short extra cover
angled in full to the pad and straightens late, Rahane adjusts for that and checks his clip in front of square
132.2 kph good length ball outside off, Rohit gathers himself quickly and defends

dropped Rohit has been tied up and now he has been handed a lifeline, he charged out and had a heave at this widish length delivery, it looped up and went straight to third man, who bent and tried taking it with fingers pointed up, and clanged it, Thisara Perera the man, and Eranga has his hands on his head in disbelief
length ball played out to midwicket
pitched up delivery squeezed with an open face to short extra cover
defended to short extra cover
opens the face and runs it to third man
a thick inside edge runs behind square, there is no one at long leg, and Rahane picks up four more, this was a front-foot defensive push, nothing more
back of a length, pushed down the track
he looks in serious touch, this is another firm push as he comes forward, and had extra cover not dived to half stop it, this was four more
length ball around off, blocked
cramped again with the incoming angle, and mistimes his punch
walks into this pitched up delivery and pushes to mid off
length ball on off stump, he is forward to defend
gets a big stride forward to a sharp length ball and defends
that has disappeared to the deep cover rope, width on a short of a length ball, Rahane gets on his toes, and flays a punch in the gap
opens the face and times another drive, straight to extra cover
angles it in, a bit too much, and this short of a length ball travels down leg
lovely delivery, the first one today to have done this, angled in, back of a length and changes direction sharply to leave Rahane and beat the outside edge
length delivery on off, Rohit turns it straight to midwicket
marginally short and Rohit pulls it off the front foot over the midwicket fielder. Not much timing behind it but Mathews' pace was not going to trouble the batsman
waits an extra second and glides this one down to third man
he stands up tall and punches the length delivery firmly but finds the man at cover

here comes the first wicket! It was a poor choice of shot from Rahane. He stays on the back foot and tries to work the length delivery away to the leg side but it just comes in a touch to beat the inside edge and strike above the knee roll. Would have hit the top of the stumps
sharp short ball to welcome the new man! It surprises Rayudu but it's well over the head
gets off the mark with a dab to third man
superb delivery! It comes in with the arm and swings away late to beat the outside edge! Rayudu was looking to drive it through covers and gets beaten
gets that away movement again but this is well wide outside off, left alone
back of length delivery on the stumps, Rayudu defends it to midwicket
on the middle stump line again, the batsman defends it back down the pitch
he picks up a single with a soft push towards mid-on for a single
superb delivery again! Eranga draws the batsman forward with a fuller length but it swings away late to beat the bat. Very close to the edge
loud appeal as now Mathews gets one to fly past the edge! The bowler is quick to apologise to the umps. It just wobbled past the bat as Rayudu came for a defensive push
takes a step down the crease but has to defend as Mathews shortens the length
short delivery now! Rayudu was ready for the pull but gets into position too early.. Has to pull out as he realises the ball is not there
down the leg side this time
he moves around the crease but pushes the length delivery straight to point
drifts on to the pads and Rayudu picks an easy single to fine leg
short ball, Rohit pulls it in a controlled manner down to fine leg. There are shouts of "catch it", but it's well short of the fielder
he pushes the length delivery down the pitch and thinks about a single but sends Rayudu back realising mid-on moves quickly to his left
this outfield is lightning! Crazy. It's on the pads and Rohit flicks it fine, but this just doesn't give a chance to the fielders. You might as well have all of them in the circle
length delivery on the off, the batsman comes forward and defends
he pushes this wide of mid-on for a quick single
digs in one short and Rayudu quietly moves out of the way this time
another bouncer, Rayudu shuffles across and fends it off towards midwicket for a single
moves across, close to the line of this short of a length ball, and punches nicely, extra cover has to dive to take pace off it
length ball left alone outside off stump
opens the face and pushes to extra cover
pulls, from well outside off stump, to deep midwicket
another pull, to the left of deep square leg, who runs across and slides, it rolls away from him, but he gets up and runs again to prevent it from touching the rope
moves across and stands deep in the crease, sees it widish outside off, and lets it be
length delivery turned to midwicket for a single
angles it in to the stumps at 135.4 kph, Rayudu gets bat down in time
uses the depth of the crease to work it in front of midwicket for a single
taps an angled length ball around off, back to the bowler
opens the face and pushes to cover
Rayudu has been done in for playing back to a ripper, pitched up, angled in, hits the pitch and straightens, Rayudu stabs at it in hope, but it zips past to uproot off stump
he's got some width on this length ball and has absolutely flayed it past backward point
pulls, not off the middle of the bat, but midwicket is vacant and the single is on
this straightened from a fullish length, but he dealt with it well, opening the face as he leaned forward to defend softly
right forward to defend a good length ball
another forward stride to push back to the bowler
reaches out to guide this widish length ball to point
length ball ending around off, he pushes it back to the bower
super touch from Rohit, using the incoming angle to flick this from the line of off to the deep midwicket boundary
fuller, around off again, this time he clips it to deep square leg
bends forward to a full one but mistimes the drive to mid off
pushes forward, opens the face, runs it down to third man
moving away at and from the line of off, defended
length ball, on middle and leg, incoming angle, Kohli's zone, and he picks up an easy boundary with a clip in front of square
good length ball on off, tapped in front of mid on for a single
gets on top of the bounce to pull from outside off, and even though there is a slide in the deep, there is no saving another boundary
128 kph bouncer into the body, Rohit hooks it down to long leg
115.7 kph length ball outside off, he guides it to point
big stride forward, and takes a hand off the bat to adjust for the extra bounce as it defends
looks to work this length ball to the leg side but ends up playing it close to the non-striker
fine punch from the crease through extra cover, and there is a lot of running for the sweeper to do
to the left of the sweeper now as he waits and cuts past point
reaches forward to push to cover and is not getting the single
thick inside edge behind square as he pushes half forward to a legbreak angled in
goes back to a straightening delivery and works it to deep midwicket
lunges forward to push to midwicket
stands in the crease and punches a pitched up ball, bowler stops it with a dive
comes down the track but cannot quite reach the pitch and pushes back to the bowler
whips it off the pad to deep square leg
has the width on this length ball but slaps it straight to extra cover
this rises from back of a length, Rohit gets on his toes and whips it past the bowler
plays close to the body and taps this short of a length ball to point
moves forward to drive in the gap at cover, sweeper fields
goes hard at this length ball outside off, but bat turns in his hand and he mishits down the pitch
squeezes a tossed up legbreak out to the sweeper
pushes a flighted one to the left of the bowler and his dive saves a single
angled in to middle and leg, he whips it straight to midwicket
turns a full one straight to midwicket again
pulls the length back a tad and he thick inside edges to leg as he pushes forward to defend
he escapes with a 125 kph short ball angled in to the pads, as Kohli swivels and pulls straight to long leg
drives off the back foot to the sweeper
Kohli pings a drive off the front foot, but extra cover moves to his right and parries it to mid off, saves a certain boundary
good length ball pushed to long on
reaches forward and drives to the left of the sweeper
waits to hit this short of a length ball hard, but not wide enough of the sweeper
makes room to a length legbreak just outside off and flashes it to the sweeper
gets inside the line again and swats a drive, straight to extra cover, and it bursts out of his hands
pushes a tossed up ball, in the air for a while, past the bowler's dive to his left
did not turn much this one, but Kohli had it covered with a big forward stride
hurries on this time, Kohli defends with a thick inside edge
played out to midwicket
angled in full outside leg, tapped wide of midwicket
bowled full down the pad again, clipped to deep midwicket
leans into a tossed up ball and pushes down to long on
straightens at 92.5 kph on middle, but Kohli handles it calmly with a push down the ground
tossed up much slower at 81 kph, Rohit reaches out and pushes to extra cover
turns in from outside off, is tapped behind square
tossed up on middle and leg, and Rohit reaches fifty on comeback after injury with a pushed single to long off
smashes this drive, and it pops out of extra cover's hands
lunges forward and turns this tossed up legbreak against the slight turn to long on
Kohli beats the sweeper easily this time to his right, moves a touch inside this line on this flighted legbreak and crashes a drive along the ground
goes deep in the crease now to nudge for a single to square leg
backs away and swats a flat and quick one down to long on
mid off is up, this is pitched up outside off, and Rohit has lofted it clean and hard, against the slight turn in
pushes a full one down to long on
drives a full delivery just out of midwicket's reach
deep midwicket is vacant and Rohit has lunged forward to chip this over into those spaces
dips very full on him, and he is standing on the crease, digs it out and hits it just over the bowler's outstretched hands, that was a chance, and Mendis did not go too eagerly for it
gets forward to push to long on
tossed up and angled in outside leg, he make some room and pushes it past short midwicket to long on
drives an overpitched ball to the bowler
comes down the track, takes it on the full and drives it swiftly into the gap between sweeper cover and long off
has him reaching forward as this dips, and a thick inside edge runs behind square
goes back in the crease to nudge a single to deep square
almost did him in, tossed up, just outside off, Kohli looking to push at it, it spun in and bounced, and was inside edged past the stumps
flashes a drive to wide long off
hurls it in 92.7 kph down the leg side
moves across and punches a flat length ball to deep midwicket
no deep midwicket, this is pitched up, and Rohit has sent it soaring into the boundary, leaning forward, back leg in the air
straight and very close to off stump, he squeezes it to short third man
whips it from outside off straight to midwicket
goes back and opens up to work it to deep midwicket
tossed up ball ends up as a low full toss and Rohit reaches forward to place it through the covers, and had sweeper not gone sprawling across the turf, this was four more
pushed down to long on for a single
pushes to cover off the front foot
opens the face a bit as he comes forward and pushes to extra cover
angled into the pad, he nudges it fine, but short fine stops it to his right
moves forward and swat a full ball from outside off to long on
makes a bit of room to an offbreak and punches it to long on
slips it way down the leg side now
sweeps off the glove fine past the keeper
goes back and across deep in the crease to nudge behind square
poor delivery, hurled short and swift down the leg side, swung hard to deep backward square leg, and it has gone through him, possibly did not pick it in the crowd
fine start from Kula, around the blockhole on off stump, dug out down the ground to long on
full again, pushed down to long on
full again but pretty wide this time, it is a legcutter, and he reaches for it to put it away through point
this legcutter sits up outside off at 99.7 kph, Rohit winds up and clobbers it over the deep midwicket boundary
overpitched outside off, Rohit launches into a drive, mid off is not far, but this is past him before he can bend down
hesitation from the non-striker after a nudge to midwicket, but sees that the bowler won't get to the ball in time, and the single is taken eventually
leans into another drive now, opens the face late as it disappears to the deep point rope
Kohli wants the single after a nudge behind square, but there is a man there, and he has to rush back
Kohli has to dive in this time as they run after a slap to extra cover, throw was too high
opens the face on a tossed up ball and runs it to short third man
whips it from outside off down to wide long on to move to 99

there is the hundred, with a single to deep square leg, and this is some celebration, Rohit runs down the pitch arms held high, points repeatedly to the skies, goes down on his knees, and gets up to soak in the applause from the crowd and appreciation from his captain, he had seen Rahane make runs at the top of the order while he recovered from injury, he's come back and made big runs in his first international game since August
full toss, put away easily to the right of deep midwicket
makes room to a yorker outside off and dabs it to point
full on the pad, clipped to deep midwicket
full toss punched down the ground, Kula saves the boundary as he sprawls to his right at mid off
flat legbreak outside leg stump, worked in front of square
outside leg again, punched down to long on
fuller down the pad, worked to square leg
fine leg is up, Rohit goes down on his knee for a huge sweep, and that clears the deep backward square boundary easily
poor ball, full outside leg stump, Rohit sweeps much finer, along the ground, well past short fine leg
pushed towards midwicket off the front foot
low full toss down the pads from round the stumps, he turns his wrists and puts it away fine
short of a length, outside off, worked to deep midwicket
full around leg stump, clipped wide of deep midwicket
another full toss, Kohli turns it straight to long leg, and does not like that
makes room to a low full toss slanted across him, gets underneath it a bit and hammers it over the reach of mid off
full one turned to deep midwicket
defended off the front foot to the bowler
length ball on off, worked to deep midwicket
slight turn in to middle, nudged through square leg
makes room to a flat one on the stumps, and cuts hard, it goes through cover's hands, he runs after it, but it is too late
four more, no sweeper on the off side, and Rohit reaches the pitch to loft with an open face over the infield, extremely effective
leans forward and pops it back to the bowler, was in the air for a while
goes back in the crease to work it to deep square leg
Rohit charges out, reaches the pitch and clobbers a dead straight six, extending the bat swing a bit as he brings it down
four now, he is racing to 150, flatter and quicker outside off, he rocks back immediately and cuts it behind point
opens the face and pushes out to the sweeper for a single
that was very close to off, as Kohli stayed back and dabbed it to short third man
starts with a slower one gone wrong down the leg side
full delivery angled in, whipped out to deep midwicket
back of a length, pushed back to the bowler
would have been a wide down leg had Kohli not reached out to nudge it to short fine
low full toss on middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket
length ball down the pad, Kohli nudges it in front of square and takes on the throw from the deep, makes it back for the second, and that is his fifty
mid off is up, this is overpitched, and Kohi has lunged into the line to dismiss it past the bowler
makes room to punch a length ball to extra cover, who fails to stop it cleanly
short and wide, poor stuff, Kohli waits and slaps it miles wide of the sweeper
punched hard off the back foot down to long off
length ball on the pad worked behind square
shot, this is pitched up, but Kohli has bent down in the crease and square driven it powerfully behind point
played out to midwicket
Rohit is raising his arms in celebration again as he gets on his toes to a back of a length ball and cracks it to the left of sweeper cover for another four
turned through square leg, and Kohli will come back for an easy second, this is the 200 of the stand up
slower bouncer, Kohli misses as he swivels and swings

Kohli has been run out, he is disgusted, smashes his bat into the ground, walks off in a huff, stares back at Rohit, it was a mishit of a slog in front of long on, fielder charged in for the catch, it bounced in front, but he did well to keep it from going past him, the throw came in to the keeper and there was no way Kohli would have made it, he was keen for the second, started, but hesitated as he saw the throw come in, but Rohit had almost reached him by then, can't really blame Rohit there
Raina gets a bouncer that angles across him and rises too much
pushes a tossed up legbreak to the bowler
almost slipped through as it hurried on, Rohit inside edges into pad
Raina escapes, charges out and inside edges a swipe just past the leg stump and the keeper
this time he connects as he comes out again, hammers it high and way over the long on boundary
swept to deep square leg
drives off the front foot, bowler flies to his left, but it is past him, down to long off
length ball worked in front of square

fine catch by Mahela Jayawardene running in and tumbling forward from sweeper cover, Raina had made room and swiped this length ball over cover, it hung in the air for a while, and Jayawardene came in quickly
there is no stopping Rohit, this cutter sits up back of a length outside off and he mows it over deep midwicket
works a pitched up ball to deep midwicket
moves across and ducks to allow a bouncer to pass over
another bouncer, Uthappa walks across and ducks again
has a go at a tossed up legbreak, inside edges to short fine leg
drives a tossed up ball down to long off
moves back to punch to sweeper cover
leaves the crease and pushes it back to the bowler
flat and quick, cut through point, but sweeper keeps it in with a dive
flighted legbreak driven with an open face to wide long off
guides a wide and full ball to point
skips down the track and lofts cleanly and effortlessly over the long off boundary
takes a slower one from outside off and drags it to deep midwicket
moves across and taps a length ball to cover to bring Rohit back on strike
pushes for a single to sweeper cover
makes room and flashes it through extra cover, long off is running across, but it brushes his fingers and slips past
four more, safe again, opens up a bit to this full ball from round the stumps, and lifts it between deep midwicket and long on
four more, to the deep square leg boundary this time, lunges forward at a sweep and hits it flat in the air
wide length ball hammered to the sweeper
tries to reverse paddle but this full ball goes to short fine off an edge instead
short and wide yet again, and sweeper cover cannot stop it as Rohit cuts

would have been the worst way to get out in the 190s, but Rohit gets the dive in after Uthappa drops this short of a length ball into the pitch and runs, Eranga could not find the stumps anyway as he kicked the ball
flicked to the deep midwicket boundary
bouncer, Uthappa ducks as it flies high over him
pats a good length ball to the bowler, it slips out of his hands to allow a single
leaves the crease, takes it on the full and clips it to deep midwicket
back of a length, he runs it down to third man
pitched up, Rohit clears front leg, and moves to 197 as he belts this straight between the bowler and non-striker
slightly back of length outside off, tapped to point
outside off again and keeps a bit low, thick outside edge runs down to third man

it's driven, will he get two or three? Oh, it's gone for four! He has done it - the first man to score a second double-hundred in ODIs, and it's the fourth overall! It was full on the middle stump, Rohit drove it through the covers from the middle of the bat, beat the fielder in the circle and at long off as well

dropped and it's gone for four at the midwicket boundary! The full toss on the leg side was pulled high in the air, Prasanna got well under it at the boundary but the ball went through his hands with fingers pointing upwards and bounced once before going for four
in the block hole outside off, digs it out on the off side for one
low full toss outside off and it's driven beautifully through the covers for four by Uthappa this time
he's finding gaps with such ease! Slower delivery outside leg from over the wicket, Rohit makes room and chips it over the covers for four more
well outside the leg stump, Rohit makes room but lets it go for a wide
high full toss on the leg side, that can't be left alone! Tonked for a massive six on the leg side and it's a no ball for overstepping

another one - is he using cheatcodes here! Free hit hammered for six over long off this time and it's highest score in ODIs. It was full outside off and he lofted it on the off side to land it a few rows back
well outside the off stump, Rohit chases without much footwork and misses
dropped again and another four! Back of length outside off, Rohit swished at it and it went very high behind square, Thirimanne chased it, got under it but it went through him too
well outside the off stump, Rohit misses again
swatted down the ground in the air again, falls well short of long-on and they take on
starts the over with a boundary, full and wide, he calmly reaches out and guides it to the right of third man
a hand comes off the bat as Rohit flays at this full delivery, thick edge flies down to third man
opens the face and squeezes it to third man, throw misses at the striker's end
mid off is up, this is a full toss, and Rohit has gone down on a knee to drive one bounce over the long off rope
hundred partnership up inside eight overs as Rohit stretches for this wide yorker, and it races wide of the keeper

this is unbelievable, this is crazy, he's walked outside off stump, this ball is outside the wide marker, but Rohit has played some sort of pick-up whip, and the ball has gone over the wide long on boundary
flicked off the pad to deep midwicket
Rohit Sharma keeps shattering records, he moves past 250 as he makes room and scythes in the air through the covers, waves his bat in circles to acknowledge Eden Gardens
this is a perfect yorker, but he is seeing the ball so well he has calmly guided it to short third man
Uthappa keeps turning the strike over, as he pushes a full one to long off, goes to the other end and has a swipe in the air
take another straight six then, as Rohit gets forward and mows a length ball over the bowler
slogged to deep midwicket for a single
this is some stop, Kusal Perera on the run at sweeper cover to pluck out a drive with one hand, saves the boundary
low full toss hit down to long off
Rohit brings up 400 as he belts this overpitched ball through extra cover, no one moved there
a hand comes off the bat as Rohit flays a low full toss to the sweeper
full and wide, driven to sweeper cover
he falls off the last ball of the innings as he charges out, takes it on the full and hits it flat to long off

inn2.comm: slips in a quick and full delivery wide outside off. Left alone
on a length, on off, holding its line against the angle. Defended back to him
and already a wicket. This is short and wide, ripe for a cut, but Perera looks to pull it, gets a healthy top edge, and Karn Sharma takes a simple catch at mid-on
full, at the stumps, pushed away to midwicket
that breaks the maiden. Yadav lets one slip down the leg side. It's a wide
short of a length, just outside off, Dilshan rises on his toes and punches it to point
short of a length again, into the body, turned away to leg for a single
gentle outswinger, widish, Dilshan leans into the drive, pushes it to the right of mid-off for four
and Binny bowls too short this time, which is not a good idea at his pace. Dilshan pulls it square, along the ground, for four
outswinger, just short of a driving length, beats Dilshan's attempt at a drive
another gentle outswinger, Dilshan shapes up for the drive, but decides at the last moment to leave it alone
short of a length, wide, crunched away, but he can't beat cover-point

lovely outswinger. It dips on him alarmingly. Dilshan thinks this is a half-volley and is ready for the drive, but the ball dips and then swings away, dropping short of his reach, and missing his edge by inches
short of a length, into the pads, Chandimal doesn't get a touch on it, is hit on the thigh
short of a length, 145ks, good bounce, Chandimal is on his toes and defends
on a length, holding its line outside off, left alone
fuller, closer to off, driven nicely, but can't beat mid-off
looks to pull this short ball from well outside off. There is no timing on this, and he has tucked this away to square leg
the mid-off is wide, and Chandimal beats him easily. Drives this length ball on the up, and beats the man to his right
nice outswinger. Not quite a half-volley, Dilshan has to be careful and allow for the movement, and he ends up playing it defensively to short cover
slightly short of a length, Dilshan gets tall to punch it, but can't beat backward point
Kohli makes a diving save at mid-off to save three runs. This is driven on the up, past short cover and well wide of mid-off, but Kohli runs hard and dives to his left to keep it in
on a length, outside off, defended with an open face
on a length outside off, holds its line a little, pushed to mid-off
nice drive. This is a wide outswinger, Chandimal plants the front foot across, gets close to the pitch of the ball, and places the drive between mid-off and extra cover
beaten for pace as Dilshan looks to crunch this through the leg side. This one angles in, beats his inside edge and hits him on the pad
Yadav is quick again, on a length, at 143ks, hits the inside half of the bat hard
slightly short of a length, he manages to pull it, to left of deep square for two
this is even shorter, and Dilshan stands tall to pull this over square leg for four runs
again he almost beats Dilshan for pace. This is full and straight, and Dilshan is late on the drive. Gets an inside edge onto the pad
slower ball, 116ks, on a length outside off, defended
length ball outside off, swings away a little, left alone
opens the face to push this length ball past backward point for one
too short for Binny's pace. Dilshan crashes this over square leg for four
nice outswinger, on a length, middle and off, moves towards off, defended to mid-off, but they come through for a quick single
a floater well outside off, Chandimal gets a stride in, but leaves it alone

another wicket down. That man at short cover does it. Binny has done well whenever he has pitched the ball up. This is a teasing length. Not the driving length, but it teases Chandimal, who ends up pushing at it well in front of his body. Easy catch for Raina at short cover
length ball, on off, driven hard, but straight to cover
short of a length, holds its line in front of off, beats the outside edge, and sails over the off stump
147ks, but too short, Dilshan is not entirely in control of this, but he has managed to place the pull between square leg and midwicket
length ball angling in, beats the inside edge, hits him on the pad
there is a flying Raina at short cover. Slower ball, driven hard, Raina dives to his left at short cover, and saves four runs

quick shortish ball, seams back in, hits him high on the pad. Yadav appeals for lbw but this is headed down leg. There is possibly an inside edge involved, but the ball doesn't carry to the diving wicketkeeper, Uthappa
short of a length, into the pads, turned around the corner for one
on a length, outside off, pushed towards cover
and Dilshan pulls out the ramp. Plants his front foot across, gets on a knee, gets under a length ball, and uses his wrists to send it fine of the diving Rohit Sharma at fine leg
short of a length, outside off, runs this down to third man for one
nice little outswinger outside off, holds its line to beat Jayawardene's outside edge
another outswinger, Jayawardene is looking to leave but is a little late, and ends up running this off the face to third man for one
nicely driven on the up, but straight to cover

Mahela doesn't look happy with this, but this is a pretty good decision. Yadav is full and straight, Jayawardene is deep in the crease, and plays across its line. This looks good to hit leg stump as it has hit his pad in front of middle and leg and doesn't have too far to travel
full and straight, swinging away too, defended from the crease
short of a length, into the pads, helped away to deep square leg
short of a length, widish, punched away to third man for one
another appeal for lbw as this one jags back in from short of a length and outside off. This one looks pretty straight, but is not given. Could be the bounce
on a length, middle and off, swinging towards off, worked away into the leg side for one
nice outswinger, short of driving length, Mathews is squared up, but gets enough bat on it take a single square of the wicket
this is the one angled in, Dilshan is a little surprised that it doesn't swing away, but gets the bat down in time to take a couple to leg

Raina is flying at short cover again, and he is coming up with balls in hand. Short of a length, around off, Dilshan looks to work this to leg but is early into the shot. The leading edge goes to the right of short cover, but not beyond the reach of Raina's dive
full, swinging in towards Thirimanne, pushed to mid-off
short of a length, angling in, towards top of off, defended off the back foot
on a length, holds its line, runs off the outer half of the bat on this drive, and goes through the gap between cover and extra cover
a thick outside edge again as Mathews is squared up. Doesn't beat point this time
on a length, angling towards off, defended from the crease by Thirimanne
short of a length, middle and leg, defended

that's a superb ball. Yadav;s bowling this series has been a big positive. Not very short, 140ks, but it rears off, stunning Thirimanne. There is an appeal for the catch at the wicket, but this has gone off his shoulder
full, on off, defended
this one swings from middle and leg, and Mathews can't do much more than defend it with respect
on a length, middle and leg, defended to mid-on
a desperate shot from Mathews as he jumps out of the crease and gets a thick edge over the slip for four
bouncer this time, Mathews is a little surprised, and he ducks under it
outswinger, middle and leg, just a push from Mathews and he has timed it well to the left of mid-on for four
a length ball on middle and off, defended to mid-on for a quick single
and immediately a drop in pace. Pushes a length ball outside off for a single to cover
short of a length, angling away, runs it to third man for one
short of a length, into the legs, and Mathews closes the face at the right time to send it hurrying to square leg for four
short of a length, into the pads again, worked away for a single
short of a length, pitches middle and off, angles away, left alone
lovely shot. Kulkarni is short of a length, at a gentle pace, Thirmanne moves across, punches this on the top, sends it past cover
slightly short, Mathews stays back to cut, but can't beat point
tosses this one up nicely, on off, defended solidly off the frront foot
slower through the air, Mathews shimmies down to drive this to long-off for one
flat, short of a length, Thirmanne stays back to punch him fine of deep point for two
flighted outside off, defended off the front foot
slightly short again, but gets some extra bounce, which means Thirmanne can't play the forceful shot he wants to play
length ball outside off, driven on the up, but straight to mid-off
short and wide, but he has sweeper cover in place to keep them to one
short of a length, angling away, takes the thick outside edge for a single
plays the short-arm pull as this is angled into the ribs. Gets a single
on a length, on off, Thirimanne is well forward to defend
short again, and pulled away to deep backward square
flighted half-volley, turns a little, runs off the inside half of the bat for a single
short of a length, Mathews rocks back to pull this wide of deep midwicket for two
nicely tossed up legbreak, defended off the front foot
another loopy legbreak, pushed to long-on this time
nice dip on this tossed-up delivery, driven to cover
on a length, holds its line in front of off, defended from the crease
short of a length, outside off, runs off the thick outside edge for one
nicely played. Short of a length, on the pads, tucked away between mid-on and square leg for four
length ball, no room, defended from the crease
short of a length, outside off, punched away to deep cover
short of a length, angling in, worked away past midwicket for two
stays short, pulled away to deep square
slight shimmy down the wicket, but gets too close to this legbreak and plays it back to him
tossed up on off, defended from the crease
Raina has begun to move from slip to leg slip even before Mathews's bat goes up. And Mathews has played just a forward defensive to disappoint Raina
punched away into the vacant space at midwicket for a couple
driven to long-off for one
short of a length, on off, played to point with an open face
uppishly punched away to deep cover for one
length ball outside off, left alone through to Uthappa
Raina is flying again. This time at backward point to make a one-handed save as Thirimanne drives with an open face
punched away this time, but this time he finds cover-point. Two solid shots amount for no run
on a length, on off, angles away, left alone
on a length, outside off, defended to cover
legbreak, tossed up outside off, defended with an open face
nice legbreak, this one dips a little, and Mathews can only defend
gets on a knee to play a Jayawardene-like fine sweep through the vacant fine leg area
nicely played. Comes down the wicket, gets close to the pitch of the ball, and whips it over midwicket for four
sharp legbreak, quick too, pitches slightly short of a driving length, and turns away from just outside off to beat the bat
slower, loopier, defended off the front foot
Kulkarni continues to remain too short, and is pulled away. Thirimanne is not in total control, but gets a single to fine leg
short of a length, outside off, he looks to work this to leg, gets a leading edge to cover
short of a length, angling in, worked to leg for one
looks to punch this to off, but doesn't have enough room, and gets a bottom edge
slower ball, on a length, on the pads, worked away to leg for one
short of a length, angling in, worked away to leg
flighted, on off, defended back to him
nice shot as he comes down the wicket to reach the pitch of the legbreak and lofts it over mid-off
quicker delivery, Thirimanne is expecting it, stays back, slashes at it, gets a bottom edge fine of first slip for four
down the wicket, but too close to the pitch of the ball, and defends it back
slightly shorter, slightly quicker, defended off the back foot
legbreak, middle and leg, worked to leg for a single
starts with a wide down the leg side
quick delivery, on the pads, worked to square leg
into the pads again, Thirimanne gets two leg-byes
full, middle and leg, driven to long-on
on a length, outside off, defended off the front foot
tossed up outside off, slower through the air, pushed to cover
fired into the pads, defended to long-on
flighted outside off, Mathews stretches forward and defends
short of a length, Mathews goes back to punch this to deep cover
flighted outside off, turns back a little, defended back to him
shimmies down the wicket to reach the pitch of the ball to drive this to long-on
Mathews reaches fifty with a drive to long-on
stays back to play a pretty full legbreak, but gets the bat down in time to work this to leg for one
short of a length, outside off, played with an open face to point
flat and fast again, and this time he places to the right of point and gets four for this
flat, on off, defended from the crease
this one jumps and turns. From a length outside off, and Mathews is stunned. Lucky not to get an edge
flighted outside off, defended to cover
on a length, Thirmanne looks to defend, gets an inside edge for one
full, middle and leg, pushed to long-on for one
short, rises and gets big on Thirimanne, who gets tall, and manages to clear point with this aerial cut
short of a length, outside off, defended off the back foot
charges down the wicket, and smashes this gentle length ball over extra cover for four
short of a length, bunted to cover for a quick single that calls for a dive from Mathews
Mathews shimmies down the wicket and pads away a flat quick delivery
plays the fine sweep after getting outside the line of off, and uses Patel's pace to get four runs
down the wicket this time, gets a massive inside edge towards deep square leg where K Sharma makes a diving save
on a length, angling in, past the inside edge, hits his pad
flighted outside off, pushed wide of point for one
flat, outside leg, helped away for an easy four fine of fine leg
short of a length, angling in, worked away to deep midwicket for one
short of a length, angling towards off, worked to leg for one
short of a length, too far down the leg side, Mathews helps it along past the short fine leg
slower offcutter, pitches on a length outside off, comes back to take the inside edge onto the pad
down the leg side again, but the fine leg is back this time, and Binny concedes just the single
tries the bouncer, bowls a loopy wide over his head
short of a length, angling in, pushed uppishly to short midwicket
fired into the pads, Mathews is beaten but the ball is headed down leg
short of a length, just outside off, defended to cover
fired in again, and defended back to him
Mathews is down the wicket to this slightly flighted delivery and he lifts it over midwicket for the first six of the innings

lovely stumping by Uthappa. Mathews is down the wicket again, Patel pulls the length back, Mathews tries to defend, is hit on the inside edge, the ball ricochets to Uthappa, who gets a good bounce, and completes the stumping
tossed up on off, defended to cover
length ball outside off, angling away, left alone
short of a length, not too wide, punched uppishly to deep point
short of a length, draws good bounce, beats the outside edge
short of a length, outside off, Perera drops his wrists and lets it go through to the keeper
short again, Perera wants to stays inside the line, but this one gets him on the chest
length ball outside off, left alone
length ball, on the pads, worked to leg for a single
full, outside off, driven towards mid-off for one
tossed up on off, played with an open face, gets a single past cover
gets a leading edge as he looks to work this to leg
defended from the crease as Patel fires this in
another dart. This hits Perera in front of the stumps, but is pitched outside leg
length ball, middle and leg, worked to square leg
tossed up on middle and leg, and played to square leg again
flighted again, and Perera defends it back to him
tossed up on middle and off, defended back to him
flatter, quicker, on the pads, defended back
another solid defensive shot from Perera to end a maiden. They look good for a draw if they can defend this well
quick, on the pads, defended to leg
short of a length, middle and leg, turns back in, manages to play it with an open face
plays the back-cut as Patel fires another one in, beats the short third man for four
short of a length, played uppishly to mid-on
five wides. Pushed through, pitched outside leg, turns too. Too much to ask of a part-time keeper to keep this in
flighted on middle and leg, defended to mid-on
slog-sweep out of nowhere. He moves forward, goes down a knee, and sends this sailing over deep midwicket for a big six
Perera breaks the shackles. Shimmies down the wicket, and lofts this over long-on. Just about clears him
quicker length ball on off, defended from the crease
that is a clean hit. Down the wicket again, has enough room to swing his arms through it, and clears long-on easily
has forced him to bowl this short, and rocks back to punch this through extra cover for four

that's huge. Down the wicket again, and he is within the reach of the pitch of the ball and absolutely smashes it over wide long-on, leaving those in the stands to fight over the possession of the ball
full and flat, pushed to long-on for one
short of a length, on off, punched to long-off for one
driven uppishly but wide enough of Raina
slower through the air, full, middle and leg, defended back to him
he is teasing them with the flight, no turn on this and hits the inside half of the bat
flighted outside off, gets some turn, defended to short cover
pushed past that man at short cover for a single
short of a length, angling in, hits the pad
full and straight, pushed to the right of Yadav, who dives full length, gets a hand to it, but can't prevent the single
lovely square drive, but can't beat the man at backward point
short, 139ks, pulled away without much power, gets a single
wide yorker, dug out to cover, takes a quick single. Kulkarni hits the stumps at the non-striker's end, but Perera is well in
makes room to cut this from in front of leg stump. Gets a single to third man
slower ball, middle and leg, defended back to him
he goes to pull a ball that is not short enough, and one that he has to drag from well outside off. Top-edges it to midwicket
short of a length, on off, runs off the outside edge, past slip
bouncer, middle and leg, he ducks under it
two wicket in an over for Kulkarni. Short of a length, middle and leg, Perera looks to open the face, gets a faint edge though to Uthappa
short of a length, on off, defended from the crease
short of a length, on off, punched to cover
nice legbreak, middle and leg, defended back to him
stays back to defend a legbreak that pitches on a length and just outside off
sweeps this from middle and leg, and beats square leg to get four
long hop, and Prasanna rocks back to pull him over deep midwicket for six
nice legbreak, gets decent amount of turn after pitching middle and leg. Beats the edge
Kulkarni gets a third wicket. Kulasekara just closes his eyes and swings across the line, doesn't make a sweet connection, and is caught at deep midwicket
short of a length, on off, defended to leg
angling into the pads, goes off the pads for four
Kulkarni has four wickets now. Pulled away to find deep square leg to perfection. This is ending fast
on a length, on off, pushed back to the bowler
short of a length, outside off, left alone
on a length, angling in, hits him on the pad
gets an outside edge on the drive for a single to third man
short of a length, down the leg side, wide
left alone outside off
down the leg side for a wide again
full, on off, driven back at him. Yadav gets a touch on it, but can't prevent the boundary to mid-off
looks to pull, hits the toe end, sails over the leaping Kohli at mid-off
short of a length, outside off, holds its line, beats the outside edge
bouncer attempted. It looks high but is not called a wide
holds its line outside off, beats the outside edge
short of a length, outside off, left alone
short of a length, on off, defended off the back foot
yorker outside off, dug out for a single to third man
wide slower ball, left alone
moves across the line to try to swipe this to leg. Is hit on the pad, but outside the line of off
down the wicket, gets a thick inside edge for a single
short of a length, gets some turn, defended off the back foot
tossed up outside off, defended off the front foot
fired in, stays back to defend
short of a length, darted in, Eranga gets a bottom edge past slip for four
short of a length, just outside off, defended off the back foot
short of a length, rising towards the chest, fended to leg
length ball angling in, beats the inside edge as he looks to slog
accurate length ball, defended back to him
short of a length ball, outside off, left alone
full outside off, dug out to mid-on

he switch-hits to his demise. They have ended 13 runs short of Rohit Sharma's score. This match was over long ago. The final touch is provided by this switch hit straight to what would have been deep cover had he played as a right-hand batsman
